projects.title: Celestial Wayfinder
projects.description: LoRa mesh communication system for outdoor navigation, using ESP32 and PlatformIO.

projects.title: ESP32 Utilities
projects.description: A collection of utilities for ESP32 development, including libraries for LoRa communication, GPS handling, and more.

projects.title: ArtNet LED Controller
projects.description: An ArtNet controller for LED strips, designed to work with WLED firmware on ESP32, allowing for networked control of lighting systems.

projects.title: Tesseract 3D Display
projects.status: Active development | Firmware validated, hardware prototyping next
projects.description: A 3D display system using ESP32-S3 and custom LED hardware. Capable of displaying nearly 30 million voxels at 60 FPS
